name: Waltzing Matilda Sunset Cruise
description:
Set sail from Airlie Beach on a sunset tour that promises to be a serene escape. This is your front-row seat to nature’s masterpiece. Embark on a sunset voyage aboard Waltzing Matilda and witness the enchanting beauty of the Whitsundays Islands at sunset:
- Sail through Pioneer Bay.
- Marvel at the breathtaking sunset over the ocean.
- Relax with a drink and nibbles.
Suitable for solo travellers, groups, couples, families, and friends. One complimentary glass of bubbles is included. Enjoy a spacious and comfortable deck area with panoramic views of the Whitsundays and Airlie Beach. This tour is all-inclusive, meaning there is nothing extra to pay. Available every Friday and Saturday.
Additional recommendations include bringing a camera to capture the incredible sunset, sunglasses for when you set off, and a rain jacket if needed.
includes: One complimentary glass of bubbles, spacious and comfortable deck area, panoramic views of the Whitsundays and Airlie Beach, all inclusive (nothing extra to pay)
highlights:
Sail through Pioneer Bay
Marvel at the breathtaking sunset over the ocean
Relax with a drink and nibbles
Suitable for solo travellers, groups, couples, families, and friends
One complimentary glass of bubbles
Spacious and comfortable deck area
Panoramic views of the Whitsundays and Airlie Beach
All inclusive (nothing extra to pay)

ideal_for: Solo travellers, groups, couples, families, and friends

name: Private Double Cabin with Ensuite
description:
Enjoy the comfort and privacy of this stylish catamaran. Fully crewed with a skipper and hostess, Whitsunday Pearl is an ideal way to escape the crowds and let us take all the responsibility for the Charter. We will transport you into a relaxed world of sailing, taking you directly and comfortably to the most scenic locations, the least crowded beaches and proven quiet calm safe anchorages.
Includes:
- Drinking water & ice
- Snorkelling – mask, snorkel, wetsuit and floatation devices
- All marine park fees
- Visit Whitehaven Beach & Hill Inlet
- Great Barrier Reef snorkelling
- Intimate group sailing with 8 guests
- Lagoon 450 vessel, 14 meters in length and 8 meters in width
- Spacious decks, perfect for relaxing
- Four stylish double cabins with private ensuites
- Experienced skipper and host
- Stand-up paddle boards included
- Solar panels to power onboard appliances
- Wifi onboard- powered by Starlink
- Charcoal filtered drinking water
- Onboard ice maker and coffee machine
Additional Information:
- BYO alcohol and drinks
- Water bottle to refill
- Sun protection (sunscreen, hat, sunglasses etc.)
- Warm clothes/pullover for evenings (seasonal)
- BYO alcohol – no glass bottles (with the exception of wine bottles)
- A $20 surcharge may apply for some dietary requests and requirements
- Additional snorkel equipment (fins, prescription masks etc.)
- Peak holiday seasons (i.e. Christmas, Easter, New Years) may incur a surcharge.
Departure and Meeting Point:
- Coral Sea Marina, Shingley Drive, Airlie Beach, QLD 4802
departure_times: Departure from Coral Sea Marina - South End - Meeting Point C
includes: Drinking water & ice, Snorkelling equipment, All marine park fees, Visit to Whitehaven Beach & Hill Inlet, Great Barrier Reef snorkelling, Intimate group sailing, Stand-up paddle boards, Solar panels, Wifi, Charcoal filtered drinking water, Onboard ice maker and coffee machine.

name: Great Barrier Reef Education Experience Program
description:
Fresh from a remarkable $1 million makeover, Summer Jo combines the iconic Whitsunday hotspots, including Whitehaven Beach and diving on the Great Barrier Reef. This spacious mega yacht comfortably accommodates 32 passengers in various cabin types, including private, air-conditioned cabins with ensuite facilities. Ideal for solo adventure-seekers, friend groups or families with older children! It’s your perfect home away from home in the Whitsundays.
Prepare to be wowed by Summer Jo’s stunning transformation. A brand-new million-dollar refit has breathed fresh life into this magnificent vessel. Dive enthusiasts, rejoice! We offer scuba diving with an incredible free scuba experience. Explore the mesmerising depths of the Great Barrier Reef like never before. Retreat to your own cozy haven in our private, air-conditioned cabins. Comfort and tranquility await you.
Witness the southern allure of world-renowned Whitehaven Beach, a destination that’s nothing short of enchanting. Set your sights on Blue Pearl Bay off Hayman Island, a pristine oasis brimming with underwater wonders. Savour mouthwatering meals lovingly prepared by our onboard chef. Culinary adventures await. Thanks to our desalinator, you can relish unlimited hot showers, a luxurious treat after a day of exploration. Dive into multiple snorkelling locations and uncover the vibrant marine life of the Whitsundays.
Summer Jo stands among the select few vessels in Airlie Beach with the privilege to journey to the majestic Outer Great Barrier Reef. Leave the gear to us! We provide snorkelling masks and snorkels, ensuring you’re well-equipped for underwater escapades. Our expansive, open-plan decks are perfect for mingling and unwinding under the sun or stars. With a dedicated Dive Master onboard, you’re in expert hands for your diving adventures. Rest assured that Summer Jo is a locally owned vessel, driven by a passion for showcasing the beauty of our beloved Whitsundays.
All meals (unless you require gluten-free, vegan or dairy-free meals) are included. Snorkelling equipment, including masks and snorkels, is provided. All diving can be decided on and paid for on board. Please note dives are subject to age, good health, weather, other conditions and the dive instructor’s discretion. For dives booked on board the boat: Every additional dive uncertified: $120, Additional dives after that: $75. BYO Vessel – no glass, no red wine.
includes: All meals (unless you require gluten-free, vegan or dairy-free meals). Snorkelling equipment, including masks and snorkels. All diving can be decided on and paid for on board.
highlights:
Iconic Whitsunday hotspots including Whitehaven Beach
Diving on the Great Barrier Reef
Scuba diving with a free scuba experience
Private, air-conditioned cabins with ensuite facilities
Mouthwatering meals prepared by an onboard chef
Unlimited hot showers
Journey to the majestic Outer Great Barrier Reef
Dedicated Dive Master onboard
Locally owned vessel

name: 3 Days and 2 Nights on Solway Lass
description:
Solway Lass is a beautifully preserved tall ship with a rich history that you’ll feel the moment you step onboard. Today, she provides leisurely sailing tours around the islands. Expansive deck space, a licensed bar, air-conditioned cabins, and a comfortable saloon ensure guest comfort. There is a fun rope swing and stand-up paddleboards adding to the excitement and adventure. You can help pull up some of the impressive 11 sails or take a turn on the helm. Whatever your age, Solway Lass is sure to deliver a unique experience and life-long memories.
Welcome to the Whitsunday Islands – nature’s playground! Immerse yourself in stunning beaches, coral, marine life, secluded bays, azure waters, bright orange sunsets, millions of stars and tranquil sunrises. Experience this unforgettable adventure in the heart of the Whitsundays.
After taking in the breathtaking views, jump back onboard as we head to Whitehaven Beach South for the afternoon. Head ashore for beach activities or relax as you feel that silica sand between your toes before Anchorage is at Whitehaven Beach for your first Whitsunday Island sunset.
Enjoy breakfast with Whitehaven Beach as your backdrop. After a hearty breakfast, head ashore for paddleboarding, and beach games. Or enjoy a walk up to Whitehaven Beach South lookout to take in the views from the opposite end of the beach. Lunch onboard as you sail north to one of the beautiful bays of Hook Island. Feeling energetic? Get involved with setting the sails or taking the helm.
You will arrive in time to enjoy an afternoon snorkel before the golden hour as the sun sets over the Whitsundays for your last night. During dinner share your travel conversations with your new-found friends whilst on deck under the stars.
After lunch, it’s time to set the sails for the final time to make way across the Whitsunday Passage. Arrive back at Airlie Beach.
Your trip includes all meals and snacks throughout the duration of the trip. We use locally sourced, seasonal fruits and vegetables and our crew freshly prepare each meal for you to enjoy. Usually served buffet-style, meals are a great communal time to get to know your fellow travellers.
Services of skipper and crew, all meals and snacks, tap water, tea and coffee, bath towel, standup paddleboards, snorkelling equipment and basic tuition, stinger suit, and all marina levies. Solway Voyager is BYO. Please pack your belongings for your trip in a soft-sided bag. What to bring: clothes, beach towel, toiletries, hat, swimwear, sunscreen, jacket/sweater, camera, sunglasses, running shoes or sandals for island walks, cash or credit card for onboard purchases.
includes: Services of skipper and crew, all meals and snacks, tap water, tea and coffee, bath towel, standup paddleboards, snorkelling equipment and basic tuition, stinger suit, and all marina levies.

Day 3: Set sails for the final time across Whitsunday Passage, return to Airlie Beach.

name: Fun Sailing Adventure in the Whitsundays
description:
Ideal for those looking for a youthful & social atmosphere, the Fun Sailing Adventure in the Whitsundays offers a classic sailing experience aboard Siska, a spacious yacht custom-built for charters in the Whitsundays. The tour includes a guided bush walk to the Hill Inlet Lookout for stunning views of Whitehaven Beach, snorkeling over fringing coral reefs, and enjoying communal meals prepared with locally sourced ingredients.
Meeting Time and Location: Please complete the online waiver form 72 hours before your vessel departure.
Day 1: Take a guided bush walk to the Hill Inlet Lookout, enjoy the views and the unique silica sand of Whitehaven Beach. Sail north to another island for sunset drinks and pre-dinner snacks.
Day 2: Early breakfast followed by snorkeling. After morning tea, swim, snorkel, or relax on the beach. Set sail across the Whitsunday Passage and return to Airlie Beach by 4 pm.
All meals and snacks are included, prepared fresh by the crew and served buffet style. The menu includes cold cut meats, cheese, salads, spaghetti bolognese, and more.
Includes services of skipper and crew, all meals and snacks, snorkeling equipment and basic tuition, stinger suit, and all bed linen.
departure_times: Departure and return times not specified, but return to Airlie Beach is at 4 pm.
includes: Services of skipper and crew, all meals and snacks, tap water, tea and coffee, snorkeling equipment and basic tuition, stinger suit, and all bed linen.

Youthful & social atmosphere
Guided bush walk to Hill Inlet Lookout
Visit to Whitehaven Beach
Sunset drinks and snacks

name: Idyllic Island Sailing Adventure
description:
Prima provides small-group sailing adventures around the Whitsundays. Prima was built for charters in the Whitsundays and is comfortable, lovingly presented with plenty of seating. There are a large saloon and dining area that can seat all 12 guests at once. The deck has a shaded canopy over the helm with lots of seating, plus a cushioned area for sunbathing. Bring your own drinks and store them in the guest fridge for easy access. No two trips are the same as we take you from one carefully selected, idyllic island location to the next.
Sample Itinerary (2 Days & 1 Night): Find anchorage in a secluded bay for a chance to jump in for a snorkel; meet the underwater life, try and find Nemo, maybe even bump into a turtle. Then be taken to your overnight anchorage in one of the many bays on Hook Island. Enjoy sunset snacks and a drink and talk about the day with your new friends before dinner is served. Take a seat on deck and view the constellations above you before heading to bed.
All meals and snacks are included for the duration of your trip. Our crew freshly prepares each meal for you to enjoy using locally sourced, seasonal fruits and vegetables. Usually served buffet style; you can choose to eat anywhere onboard. Meals are a great communal time to get to know your fellow travellers.
Menu: Donuts, Tea, and Coffee; Pesto Pasta Salad, Tuna Salad, Cooked Meats, Deconstructed Salad, and Wraps; Chicken and Vegetable Skewers, Fresh Seasonal Salad, Potato Salad, and Garlic Bread (Vegetarian Option: Marinated Tofu); Cereals, Fruit Salad, Croissants, Spreads, Yoghurt, Tea, and Coffee; Build your own burgers – Burger Patties, Fried Onion, Coleslaw, Bread Rolls (Vegetarian Option: Vegetarian Burger Patties).
Includes: Services of skipper and crew, all meals and snacks, tap water, tea and coffee, snorkelling equipment and basic tuition, bath towel, stinger suit, and all bed linen. Prima has a BYO policy for all soft and alcoholic beverages. No drinks are for sale on board. Please pack in a soft sided zipless bag.
What to bring: clothes, beach towel/sarong, toiletries, hat, swimwear, sunscreen, jacket/sweater, camera, sunglasses, runners or sandals for island walks.
Accommodation: Prima has a range of private cabins and open plan style accommodations to suit everyone. There are two private double cabins with ensuite bathroom facilities, two private double cabins with shared bathroom facilities and a double bed, and two single beds in open-plan accommodation with shared bathroom facilities.
departure_times: Departure and return times are not specified.
includes: Services of skipper and crew, all meals and snacks, tap water, tea and coffee, snorkelling equipment and basic tuition, bath towel, stinger suit, and all bed linen. Prima has a BYO policy for all soft and alcoholic beverages. No drinks are for sale on board.

name: Whitsunday Getaway
description:
Enjoy the comfort and privacy of this stylish catamaran. Fully crewed with a skipper and hostess, Whitsunday Getaway is an ideal way to escape the crowds and let us take all the responsibility for the Charter. We will transport you into a relaxed world of sailing, taking you directly and comfortably to the most scenic locations, the least crowded beaches and proven quiet calm safe anchorages.
Arrive at Coral Sea Marina South – Meeting Point ‘C’ 2:30 pm to begin your Whitsunday Getaway experience. Your skipper and hostess will be waiting to greet you and welcome you aboard your floating home for the next few days. After a quick vessel safety briefing, we begin sailing effortlessly, passing through surreal island scenery. There is endless beauty to behold while underway and plenty to learn from your knowledgeable crew while you search for the perfect protected bay to drop anchor for the night. Guests are welcomed and encouraged to try their hand at sailing, and whether you are a beginner or a seasoned sailor, our experienced crew are always happy to share their love of sailing and the sea with others. You may also opt to relax with a refreshing drink instead, lapping up the luxury of the boat while the crew take over. Choose to do as little or as much as you like on this voyage, the world is your oyster!
As you enjoy pre-dinner drinks and get to know your fellow travellers, your hostess will be preparing your first gourmet meal. After dinner, continue relaxing with the company of your new friends, taking in the tranquillity surrounding you. When you’re feeling drowsy, take a last glance across the shimmering waters and turn in for the night in your comfy cabin, where you’ll be rocked to sleep by the gentle ocean swell.
Don’t sleep in – there’s too much to do! The crew are up early to make you a ‘cuppa’ and prepare your fabulous continental breakfast. After a pleasant and invigorating sail, it’s time to visit the euphoric Whitehaven Beach, with its remarkably pure silica sand. Experience first hand why this beach is often rated the most beautiful in the world! After enjoying a few hours on the beach, your hostess will take you on an informative guided bush walk up to the picture-perfect postcard that is Hill Inlet lookout. This view is not to be missed as it is a once in a lifetime opportunity to view the stunning and intriguing swirling sands that make Whitehaven’s Hill Inlet world-famous!
After a superb buffet lunch back onboard Getaway, we make our way up to the northern Whitsunday Islands to snorkel a vibrant underwater world filled with colour, life and beauty. When the evening sets in, so do the sails as we make our way to another spectacular anchorage to spend the night, reflecting on the day’s excursion.
Indulge in your final breakfast onboard Getaway and seize the opportunity for one last snorkel, or try your hand at stand-up paddleboarding. As we sail back towards Airlie Beach, soak up the raw beauty of our alluring island archipelago while relaxing on the spacious deck and forward outdoor lounge.
Upon returning to the mainland, we guarantee you will remember this once in a lifetime trip with a smile and fond memories of your adventures with us in the Whitsunday Islands. There we will say farewell, wishing you all the best in your future travels, knowing you’ll treasure the wealth of memories made in the Whitsundays for decades to come!
departure_times: Departure: 2:30 pm from Coral Sea Marina South
includes: Fully crewed with a skipper and hostess, gourmet meals, guided bush walk, snorkeling, stand-up paddleboarding, sailing experience.

name: Great Barrier Reef Education Experience Program
description:
Step aboard our newly refitted mega yacht, now more luxurious than ever, with top-notch amenities for ultimate comfort. Get ready for a social, action-packed journey filled with unforgettable moments of snorkelling and exploring the breathtaking Whitsundays.
Dive into Vibrant Coral Reefs: Immerse yourself in flourishing fringing reefs as you snorkel or dive in some of the most spectacular underwater spots around. Visit the world-famous Whitehaven Beach and other postcard-worthy Whitsunday locations—each one more stunning than the last.
Level Up Your Dive Skills: Take your adventure to the next level with the option to complete your Advanced Dive Course right on board!
Day 1 – 4 PM: Set off from the Port of Airlie and cruise toward Tongue Bay. Get to know your fellow travellers while soaking in the stunning scenery and your first unforgettable Whitsunday sunset.
Day 1: Culinary Journey Begins: Exquisite Fruit Platter with a vibrant array of seasonal fruits, artfully arranged to awaken your senses. Authentic Chicken Tikka Masala; Tender chicken morsels simmered in a rich, aromatic sauce infused with exotic spices. Fluffy Steamed Rice; A perfectly cooked companion, fluffy and fragrant, ideal for soaking up every delicious drop. Mango Chickpea Salad; A refreshing medley of succulent mango and hearty chickpeas, dressed in a tangy vinaigrette for that bright zing. Yogurt Mint Raitha; Creamy yogurt blended with fresh mint, a cooling delight to complement the spices. Crispy Samosas and Onion Bhajis; Golden, flaky pastries filled with spiced goodness, served alongside savory onion fritters, all begging to be dipped. Heavenly Berry and Apple (or Peach) Crumble; A luscious blend of fruits enveloped in a buttery, crumbly topping that melts in your mouth, served warm for the ultimate indulgence.
Day 2: A Wholesome Delight: Buffet featuring fresh bread selection, decadent spreads, crisp and crunchy cereals, creamy yogurts and more! Morning Tea: Gourmet Mini Muffins; Delightfully moist and bursting with flavours, these bite-sized treats are perfect for a cozy morning. Savory Wraps; Soft, warm wraps brimming with your choice of delicious fillings, perfectly wrapped to perfection. Artisan Cold Meats or Flavourful Falafel; Succulent slices of fine meats or crispy falafel for a hearty bite. Garden-Fresh Salad; A vibrant bowl of greens, kissed by the crunch of lettuce and a drizzle of dressing. Sundried Tomato Pesto; Rich and flavourful, this pesto elevates every bite with its sun-kissed essence. Creamy Hummus with Fresh Veggies; Silky smooth hummus paired with fresh celery, carrots, capsicum, and crisp rice crackers for dipping. Rich Chilli Con Carne; Hearty and spicy, this robust dish is a perfect blend of tender meat and bold spices. Creamy Guacamole; Indulge in rich, velvety guacamole, a must-have for dipping! Fluffy Rice; The perfect base to soak up all those captivating flavours. Crispy Tortilla Chips; Golden and crunchy, ideal for scooping and crunching.
Begin your day with a beautiful sunrise, a hot cup of coffee, and a delicious breakfast. Spend your final morning exploring your last snorkel and dive spots before we head back into port, ending your unforgettable Whitsundays journey.
departure_times: Departs Mondays and Wednesdays at 4 pm, Returns Wednesdays and Fridays at 2 pm
includes: Luxury accommodation on a mega yacht, snorkelling and diving equipment, Advanced Dive Course option, all meals and refreshments, guided tours of the Whitsundays and Whitehaven Beach.
highlights:
Explore the vibrant coral reefs
Visit the world-famous Whitehaven Beach
Social and action-packed journey
Luxurious mega yacht experience
Option to complete Advanced Dive Course
Stunning Whitsunday sunsets
Delicious culinary experiences
Comfortable and luxurious accommodations

name: Waltzing Matilda: 2 Day 1 Night Whitsundays Cruise
description:
Waltzing Matilda offers exclusive small group sailing adventures for an intimate and personalised experience. Ideally suited to chartering through these azure waters, Waltzing Matilda boasts comfort and style, ensuring every moment aboard is nothing short of magical. Settle into our cosy, well-appointed spaces where every detail is taken care of with love. Waltzing Matilda’s spacious saloon and dining area warmly welcomed all 15 guests, allowing for shared meals and stories in a setting that felt like home. The vessel’s layout is thoughtfully designed to foster community and connection among guests, making each journey a unique experience. With Waltzing Matilda, no two adventures are alike. Our journey is a tapestry of carefully chosen, idyllic island locations, each unveiling its piece of paradise. From secluded beaches to vibrant coral reefs, the Whitsundays are a treasure trove of natural wonders waiting to be explored. Join us aboard Waltzing Matilda for an unforgettable sailing adventure, where the beauty of the Whitsundays is matched only by the warmth and comfort of your experience.
Includes:
- Very knowledgeable, helpful and friendly crew
- Wide flat decks with shade awnings
- Meals prepared onboard using fresh local produce
- Snorkelling equipment and tuition provided
- All marine & park fees included
What to Bring:
- Warmer clothing (during the winter months)
- Sunscreen and a hat (during summer months)
- Hat and sun-safe clothing, swimwear and towel
includes: Very knowledgeable, helpful and friendly crew, wide flat decks with shade awnings, meals prepared onboard using fresh local produce, snorkelling equipment and tuition provided, all marine & park fees included.
